CS2000/setmap.m

00001 %author Sandy Buschmann, Jan Winter TU Berlin
00002 %email j.winter@tu-berlin.de
00003 val = get(hpop,'Value');
00004 if val == 1
00005     colormap(hsv)
00006 elseif val == 2
00007     colormap(hot)
00008 elseif val == 3
00009     colormap(cool)
00010 elseif val == 4
00011     colormap(gray)
00012 end
